page.title: 09CHILDREN'S GAMES IN HAM
page.content: These are some of the playground games we play in Ham.{ {Had, Elastics, Forty Forty, Outings, {Bulldog, Stuck in the Mud, Piggy in {the Middle, Wall Ball, Donkey, Hide {and Seek, One Knee, Skipping, Hula {Hoop, War, Frisby. { }This is how you play some of the games.{Elastics}is mainly a girls game which involves jumping and bouncing over an elastic band.The main idea of { Bulldog} is to get past the person who is 'it' without him touching you. In the game of{Had}you have to choose someone to be 'it' then he or she has to count to 50 and has to touch someone and say 'had' then they're 'it'.{Wall Ball}is mainly a boys game because girls might just get hurt.The boys stand against a wall or fence and one person has to throw a ball against another person and hit them.
